shortDescription: 2D psychological puzzle RPG with meta-puzzles that interface with files outside of the game. Featured at the Tokyo Indie Games Summit 2025
resumeBullets: Communicated with the creative director and engineers to design, experiment, and iterate on meta-narrative puzzles using the .NET Framework to break the fourth wall and further player immersion.
Implemented a Steamworks API wrapper in Unity, enabling further player engagement through Steam Achievements.
Animated and sequenced in-game cutscenes that drove the narrative forward and conveyed a sense of fear and helplessness central to the game's theme.
